isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - REASSEMBLE - SPLITTER CYLINDER ASSEMBLY

step1.para: If previously removed, install the small O-ring in the cylinder housing bore ( Figure 174).

figure.caption: Figure 174. Install Small O-Ring in Cylinder Housing Bore

step1.para: If removed, install the O-ring on the piston O.D. (left, Figure 175). Insert the yoke bar in the cylinder housing bore (right).

figure.caption: Figure 175. Install O-Ring on Piston O.D.

step1.para: If previously removed, install the insert valve, flat end to the outside, and the valve retaining nut in the bottom bore of the cylinder cover ( Figure 176). Tighten to 40 to 50 ft-lbs. (54 to 68 N·m).

figure.caption: Figure 176. Install Insert Valve and Valve Retaining Nut

note.para: Prior to installation of the insert valve, make sure the three O-rings on the valve O.D. are not defective. Replace, if required.

step1.para: Place the new splitter cylinder gasket, splitter cylinder assembly, new splitter cylinder cover gasket and splitter cylinder cover onto the auxiliary housing ( Figure 177). Apply Loctite 242 or equivalent to the bolt threads. Install the bolts into the assembly and tighten to 20 to 25 ft-lbs. (27 to 34 N·m).

figure.caption: Figure 177. Place Splitter Cylinder Assembly onto Auxiliary Housing
